record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, JUNE 11, 2007, AT 2 P.M.

speaking.paragraph: If there is no further business today, I now ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 10:33 p.m., adjourned until Monday, June 11, 2007, at 2 p.m.
